response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $12,000 to me. Considering its importance to you, I'm offering it to you for $9,500. This price not only ensures a fair deal but also allows you to acquire an asset that exceeds its cost by $1,500. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success.", "product_price": 9500}
